image: resized_images/Why is Garuda (Eagle) the Vehicle of Vishnu?.png
text:
Garuda (eagle) is said to be the king of the birds.
 It is the fearest of bird.
 Thus God is assuring his devotees to be fearless, because if any calamity befell them, he will reach them in no time.
title: Why is Garuda (Eagle) the Vehicle of Vishnu?
